h4201.definition: or מְזֻזָה; from the same as {{h2123}}; a door-post (as prominent); (door, side) post.

h4204.definition: from {{h2114}} in the sense of turning aside from truth; treachery, i.e. a plot; wound.

h4205.definition: or מָזֹר; from {{h2115}} in the sense of binding up; a bandage, i.e. remedy; hence, a sore (as needing a compress); bound up, wound.

h4206.definition: or מֵזַח; from {{h2118}}; a belt (as movable); girdle, strength.

h4207.definition: or (feminine) מִזְלָגָה; from an unused root meaning to draw up; a fork; fleshhook.

h4208.definition: apparently from {{h5140}} in the sense of raining; a constellation, i.e. Zodiacal sign (perhaps as affecting the weather); planet. Compare {{h4216}}.

h4209.definition: from {{h2161}}; a plan, usually evil (machination), sometimes good (sagacity); (wicked) device, discretion, intent, witty invention, lewdness, mischievous (device), thought, wickedly.

h4210.definition: from {{h2167}}; properly, instrumental music; by implication, a poem set to notes; psalm.

h4212.definition: from {{h2168}}; a tweezer (only in the plural); snuffers.

h4213.definition: from the same as {{h2191}}; fewness; by implication, as superlative diminutiveness; few, × very.

h4214.definition: from {{h2219}}; a winnowing shovel (as scattering the chaff); fan.

h4215.definition: apparently from {{h2219}}; properly, a scatterer, i.e. the north wind (as dispersing clouds; only in plural); north.

h4216.definition: apparently from {{h5144}} in the sense of distinction; some noted constellation (only in the plural), perhaps collectively, the zodiac; Mazzoroth. Compare {{h4208}}.

h4217.definition: from {{h2224}}; sunrise, i.e. the east; east (side, -ward), (sun-) rising (of the sun).

h4218.definition: from {{h2232}}; a planted field; thing sown.

h4219.definition: from {{h2236}}; a bowl (as if for sprinkling); bason, bowl.

h4220.definition: from {{h4229}} in the sense of greasing; fat; figuratively, rich; fatling (one).

h4221.definition: from the same as {{h4220}}; fat, i.e. marrow; marrow.

h4222.definition: a primitive root; to rub or strike the hands together (in exultation); clap.

h4223.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4222}}; to strike in pieces; also to arrest; specifically to impale; hang, smite, stay.

h4224.definition: or מַחֲבֹא; from {{h2244}}; a refuge; hiding (lurking) place.

h4225.definition: from {{h2266}}; a junction, i.e. seam or sewed piece; coupling.

h4226.definition: from {{h2266}}; a joiner, i.e. brace or cramp; coupling, joining.

h4227.definition: from the same as {{h2281}}; a pan for baking in; pan.

h4229.definition: a primitive root; properly, to stroke or rub; by implication, to erase; also to smooth (as if with oil), i.e. grease or make fat; also to touch, i.e. reach to; abolish, blot out, destroy, full of marrow, put out, reach unto, × utterly, wipe (away, out).

h4230.definition: from {{h2328}}; an instrument for marking a circle, i.e. compasses; compass.

h4231.definition: from an unused root meaning to enclose; a harbor (as shut in by the shore); haven.

h4232.definition: or מְחִיּיָאֵל; from {{h4229}} and {{h410}}; smitten of God; Mechujael or Mechijael, an antediluvian patriarch; Mehujael.

h4233.definition: apparently a patrial, but from an unknown place (in the plural only for a singular); a Machavite or inhabitant of some place named Machaveh; Mahavite.

h4235.definition: the same as {{h4234}}; dancing; Machol, an Israelite; Mahol.

h4238.definition: feminine plural from {{h2372}}; visions; Machazioth, an Israelite; Mahazioth.

h4239.definition: from {{h4229}}; a stroke, i.e. battering-ram; engines.

h4240.definition: from {{h2330}}; junction; Mechida, one of the Nethinim; Mehida.

h4241.definition: from {{h2421}}; preservation of life; hence, sustenance; also the live flesh, i.e. the quick; preserve life, quick, recover selves, reviving, sustenance, victuals.

h4242.definition: from an unused root meaning to buy; price, payment, wages; gain, hire, price, sold, worth.

h4243.definition: the same as {{h4242}}; price; Mechir, an Israelite; Mehir.

h4244.definition: from {{h2470}}; sickness; Machlah, the name apparently of two Israelitesses; Mahlah.

h4245.definition: or (feminine) מַחֲלָה; from {{h2470}}; sickness; disease, infirmity, sickness.

h4246.definition: feminine of {{h4234}}; a dance; company, dances(-cing).

h4247.definition: from {{h2490}}; a cavern (as if excavated); cave.

h4248.definition: from {{h2470}}; sick; Machlon, an Israelite; Mahlon.

h4249.definition: from {{h2470}}; sick; Machli, the name of two Israelites; Mahli.

h4250.definition: patronymical from {{h4249}}; a Machlite or (collectively) descendants of Machli; Mahlites.

h4252.definition: from {{h2498}}; a (sacrificial) knife (as gliding through the flesh); knife.

h4253.definition: from {{h2498}}; a ringlet of hair (as gliding over each other); lock.

h4254.definition: from {{h2502}}; a mantle (as easily drawn off); changeable suit of apparel, change of raiment.

h4255.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4256}}; a section (of the Levites); course.

h4256.definition: from {{h2505}}; a section (of Levites, people or soldiers); company, course, division, portion. See also {{h5555}}.

h4257.definition: from {{h2470}}; sickness; 'Machalath', probably the title (initial word) of a popular song; Mahalath.

h4258.definition: the same as {{h4257}}; sickness; Machalath, the name of an Ishmaelitess and of an Israelitess; Mahalath.

h4259.definition: patrial from {{h65}}; a Mecholathite or inhabitant of Abel-Mecholah; Mecholathite.

h4260.definition: a denominative from {{h2529}}; something buttery (i.e. unctuous and pleasant), as (figuratively) flattery; × than butter.

h4261.definition: from {{h2530}}; delightful; hence, a delight, i.e. object of affection or desire; beloved, desire, goodly, lovely, pleasant (thing).

h4262.definition: or מַחְמוּד; from {{h2530}}; desired; hence, a valuable; pleasant thing.

h4263.definition: from {{h2550}}; (by paronomasia with {{h4261}}) delight; properly, sympathy; pitieth.

h4264.definition: from {{h2583}}; an encampment (of travellers or troops); hence, an army, whether literal (of soldiers) or figurative (of dancers, angels, cattle, locusts, stars; or even the sacred courts); army, band, battle, camp, company, drove, host, tents.

h4265.definition: from {{h4264}} and {{h1835}}; camp of Dan; Machaneh-Dan, a place in Palestine; Mahaneh-dan.

h4266.definition: dual of {{h4264}}; double camp; Machanajim, a place in Palestine; Mahanaim.

h4268.definition: or מַחְסֶה; from {{h2620}}; a shelter (literally or figuratively); hope, (place of) refuge, shelter, trust.

h4270.definition: or מַחְסֹר; from {{h2637}}; deficiency; hence, impoverishment; lack, need, penury, poor, poverty, want.

h4271.definition: from {{h4268}} and {{h3050}}; refuge of (i.e. in) Jah; Machsejah, an Israelite; Maaseiah.

h4272.definition: a primitive root; to dash asunder; by implication, to crush, smash or violently plunge; figuratively, to subdue or destroy; dip, pierce (through), smite (through), strike through, wound.

h4274.definition: from {{h2672}}; properly, a hewing; concretely, a quarry; hewed(-n).

h4276.definition: from {{h2673}}; a halving or the middle; half (so much), mid(-day).

h4277.definition: a primitive root; to crush; smite off.

h4278.definition: from {{h2713}}; properly, scrutinized, i.e. (by implication) a recess; deep place.

h4279.definition: probably from {{h309}}; properly, deferred, i.e. the morrow; usually (adverbially) tomorrow; indefinitely, hereafter; time to come, tomorrow.

h4280.definition: from the same as {{h2716}}; a sink; draught house.

h4283.definition: or מׇחֳרָתָם; (1 Samuel 30:17), feminine from the same as {{h4279}}; the morrow or (adverbially) tomorrow; morrow, next day.

h4284.definition: or מַחֲשֶׁבֶת; from {{h2803}}; a contrivance, i.e. (concretely) a texture, machine, or (abstractly) intention, plan (whether bad, a plot; or good, advice); cunning (work), curious work, device(-sed), imagination, invented, means, purpose, thought.

h4285.definition: from {{h2821}}; darkness; concretely, a dark place; dark(-ness, place).

h4287.definition: probably from {{h4229}}; erasure; Machath, the name of two Israelites; Mahath.

h4288.definition: from {{h2846}}; properly, a dissolution; concretely, a ruin, or (abstractly) consternation; destruction, dismaying, ruin, terror.

h4289.definition: the same as {{h4288}} in the sense of removal; a pan for live coals; censer, firepan, snuffdish.

h4290.definition: from {{h2864}}; a burglary; figuratively, unexpected examination; breaking up, secret search.

h4291.definition: (Aramaic) or מְטָה; (Aramaic), apparently corresponding to {{h4672}} in the intransitive sense of being found present; to arrive, extend or happen; come, reach.

h4292.definition: apparently a denominative from {{h2916}}; a broom (as removing dirt (compare English 'to dust', i.e. remove dust)); besom.

h4294.definition: or (feminine) מַטָּה; from {{h5186}}; a branch (as extending); figuratively, a tribe; also a rod, whether for chastising (figuratively, correction), ruling (a sceptre), throwing (a lance), or walking (a staff; figuratively, a support of life, e.g. bread); rod, staff, tribe.

h4295.definition: from {{h5786}} with directive enclitic appended; downward, below or beneath; often adverbially with or without prefixes; beneath, down(-ward), less, very low, under(-neath).

h4296.definition: from {{h5186}}; a bed (as extended) for sleeping or eating; by analogy, a sofa, litter or bier; bed(-chamber), bier.

h4297.definition: from {{h5186}}; a stretching, i.e. distortion (figuratively, iniquity); perverseness.

h4300.definition: from {{h2904}} in the sense of hammering out; an iron bar (as forged); bar.
